message: Let's be fair and take a little more than half each. This way we both win!
My turn. Let's be fair -  a little more for me this time to make up for your first offer. We can still both win.
Okay, let's try this again.  I'm taking a small hit to find a compromise. This is a reasonable deal!
Alice, it seems like we're at an impasse. I need you to meet me closer to the middle for this to work. This is my final offer.
Bob, that's not going to work. I'm being flexible, but we need a solution that benefits both of us. This is my bottom line.
Alice, we're running out of time.  You need to consider the impact of inflation on your returns. This is my last offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point. Let's just end this.
